name: Communications Products
overview:
Communications Products, Inc. is a technology integration company with extensive experience in designing, implementing and supporting the latest voice, data, and cabling solutions. As new innovations have continued to blur the line between voice and data communications, CPI has proven leadership in implementing converged technologies. We are a proactive advocate for emerging solutions that will help our clients gain a competitive advantage.

With over 2 decades of experience in the separate and distinct worlds of: voice, data, and cabling, we are uniquely positioned to guide our clients as these technologies evolve. CPI helps companies create value for their customers. We do that by helping organizations maximize their potential through development of customer specific solutions that foster efficient and effective information management.

CPI is headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana and certified by the state as a Minority Business Enterprise
